SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.READ_COUNT, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, B.BOARD_CODE, M.PROFILE_IMG,

CASE WHEN SYSDATE - B.BOARD_CREATE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - B.BOARD_CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - B.BOARD_CREATE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - B.BOARD_CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - B.BOARD_CREATE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - B.BOARD_CREATE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END AS BOARD_CREATE_DATE

LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BOARD_NO, IMG_PATH, IMG_RENAME FROM BOARD_STEP WHERE THUMBNAIL_CHECK = 'Y' ) S ON B.BOARD_NO = S.BOARD_NO
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO FROM RECIPE_BOARD_LIKE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ) LB ON B.BOARD_NO = LB.BOARD_NO
